name: The Nose Job Quiz / Test | 'Seinfeld' - Season 3 | 10 Questions

questions.text: What was on George's teeth during an interview?
questions.explanation:
Spinach.

	He lost the chance at that job, but he doesn't seem to mind it.  Jerry on the other hand met a woman inside an elevator.

questions.text: What is the name of George's girlfriend?
questions.explanation:
Audrey.

	Everyone agrees that Audrey's nose is too big.  Jerry and George spend a conversation talking about the size of her nose.

questions.text: Who reveals to George's girlfriend that she needs a nose job?
questions.explanation:
Kramer.

	Audrey finds other girls in New York intimidating, but Kramer says she'd be just like them if she had a nose job, so she thinks about it.

questions.text: What happened to the guy that owns the jacket Kramer wants?
questions.explanation:
He was arrested.

	The guy used to be with Kramer's mother, but he got the jacket back from Kramer over a few previous episodes.  Now, the guy is in jail for mail fraud, so Kramer tries to get the jacket back.

questions.text: Who is George's girlfriend staying with?
questions.explanation:
Elaine.

	It is explained in a deleted scene that Audrey is staying with Elaine only until Elaine's roommate Tina returns.

questions.text: What is the name of the woman that Jerry meets in the elevator?
questions.explanation:
Isabel.

	He is really disgusted by her, yet he's really attracted to her physically.  He started his first conversation with her in the elevator, and she had no idea what he was talking about.

questions.text: Does the nose job look good?
questions.explanation:
No.

	Everyone tries to hide their feelings about the nose, but Kramer tells Audrey that she was butchered.

questions.text: Do George and his girlfriend break up during this episode?
questions.explanation:
Yes.

	Audrey realizes that George doesn't want to be around her or her hideous nose, so she tells him that she doesn't want to be near him.

questions.text: What is the fake name that Elaine uses to get the jacket from the landlord?
questions.explanation:
Wanda.

	According to that scene, the name of the man who owned the jacket was Albert Pepper.  In this scene, Kramer pretends to be Elaine's fiance, Professor Van Nostrum.

questions.text: What is the name of Kramer's mother?
questions.explanation:
Babs.

	Babs Kramer appears in the sixth season episode "The Stall".  Kramer gets his jacket and he ends up dating George's now ex-girlfriend, Audrey.
